bug.author: rushabh-v
bug.description:
Thank you for submitting a TensorFlow documentation issue. Per our GitHub policy, we only address code/doc bugs, performance issues, feature requests, and build/installation issues on GitHub. The TensorFlow docs are open source! To get involved, read the documentation contributor guide: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs>https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/upgrade#recommended_upgrade_process>https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/upgrade#recommended_upgrade_process</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
there is two consecutive "will" in the point Run the upgrade script. <denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Are you planning to also submit a pull request to fix the issue? Yes. I'll be opening a PR soon.

comments.comment: rushabh-v please confirm if we may close this issue as its been monitored in pr <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/1509>#1509</denchmark-link>
